#summary RoutePlannerAnnotations is a web application that allows a client to find the shortest route(s) between two stations on the London Underground.

= Introduction =

RoutePlannerAnnotations was completed with a team of nine people while training at the FDM Academy. 

==Project Specifications==
  * Allow user to find the shortest route(s) between two stations
  * The "shortest route" is the route that has the least number of stops as well as the least number of line transfers.
